article_title: Hospitals Fear Cigna-Anthem Clout In Blue Cross Network

article_metadata.description: As if the merger of Cigna into Anthem isn’t threatening enough to medical care providers, hospitals now say the combined entity will have added unfair market power through the national network of Blue Cross and Blue Shield plans. The American Hospital Association, which represents some 5,000 hospitals and health systems across [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
